content.raw:
I don't mind if the dark skin of door is retained. At least it will be similar in sun or without sun.
Can we have some  marker on the handle that will let us know how much the handle has rotated. There is no other knob or indication available to robot if the handle has completed one full rotation. If there is a small patch on one spot, then visually it can detect one full rotation.
content.html: I don't mind if the dark skin of door is retained. At least it will be similar in sun or without sun. Can we have some marker on the handle that will let us know how much the handle has rotated. There is no other knob or indication available to robot if the handle has completed one full rotation. If there is a small patch on one spot, then visually it can detect one full rotation.
